name: In the archive
description:
2021 7drl challenge

Play as a lowly Archivalist called into the archives where artifacts and history of monsters are stored. It was always rumored that great monsters were sealed there as well. One day a letter called upon this scribe to come to archives to solve a situation.

Find scrolls on sealed monsters that destroy towns, find their weakness and take them down before they reach full power.

This years didn't go so good and could use a lot more love but its done.
